section.heading: Action by majority.
section.text: If there is more than one arbitrator, the powers of an arbitrator shall be exercised by a majority of the arbitrators, but all of them shall conduct the hearing under § 16-4415(c).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 13 of the Uniform Arbitration Act (2000).
